channel.title: Project Lexion 317#
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/7439/bannervsw.png[/img] Welcome to Project Lexion!
Project Lexion I started project lexion at 7th of August, 2009 and, got pretty far. The server will have a good economy and no fast leveling, im using dodian as the Base.
Client Im using, Deob 317 client as the base, i havent edited it yet but i will!, right now im Using bluurrs client.
[B]The Team![/B] [B]Server Delv.[/B] Exielez .Nicolas.
Update protocol [CODE] Food timer Wilderness levels Perfect attack emotes Perfect pick up Basic but working magic High alching Basic PVN Basic PVP 100% Teleporting Npc training 95% Melee 90% Range 75% defence bonuses Dharoks Effect 100% specials Specbar takes 5 minuts to refill Very Basic slayer Basic Bones bury Wooducutting Clue Scrolls + Rewards [/CODE]
[B][U]Barrows effect[/U][/B] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/zvxv1x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/fd4t8j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2pzzaq9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/spc2ew.png[/img] [B][U]Woducutting[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/1707/75246097.png[/img]
Eating timer [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/8731/eatingtimer.gif[/img] Bones Bury [IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/6048/bonesbory.gif[/img] Perfect Picking up [IMG]http://img148.imageshack.us/img148/2078/pickup.gif[/img] Specials [IMG]http://img36.imageshack.us/img36/6585/whipe.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/9933/ddss.gif[/img] [B][U]Low Alching[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/7388/alching.gif[/img] [B][U]High Alching[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/7388/alching.gif[/img] [B][U]Skill capes[/U][/B] [IMG]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/9258/skillcapes.gif[/img] [B][U]Clue Scrolls + Rewards[/U][/B] [IMG]http://[IMG]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/3079/clue.gif[/img][/IMG] Emotes [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1499/emotes.gif[/img][/SPOILER] [SPOILER="Video"][B][U]Modern Magic system[/U][/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U2VfCv5XWFw]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U2VfCv5XWFw[/url] [B][U]Ancients magic[/U][/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F71DfLfoAdk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F71DfLfoAdk[/url] PVP video [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m33gE-ceKLg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=m33gE-ceKLg[/url]
Lastest Update! [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/1499/emotes.gif[/img] [/CENTER]
[B][U]Support this Project put this in your siggy [IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/392/battleages.png[/img][/U][/B]

I started project lexion at 7th of August, 2009 and, got pretty far. The server will have a good economy and no fast leveling, im using dodian as the Base.
